subject: Baseball
Cy Young Award
lead_paragraph: The Dodgers’ Kershaw was named the National League Cy Young Award winner for the third time, while the Indians’ Kluber beat out Felix Hernandez for the A.L. honor.
snippet: The Dodgers’ Kershaw was named the National League Cy Young Award winner for the third time, while the Indians’ Kluber beat out Felix Hernandez for the A.L. honor.
